description: This header file declares functions to collect system, reboot, and service list statistics, intended for IPC communication within a watchdog system component.

methods.name: collectSystemStats
methods.description: Collects all system data and adds it into the runtime stats hash map.

methods.name: collectRebootStats
methods.description: Collects reboot statistics into the runtime stats hash map.

methods.name: collectServiceListStats
methods.description: Gets stats for all services running from Watchdog into the runtime stats hash map.
